mapper.select: SELECT T.NO, T.TITLE, H.CONTENT FROM TBL_TERMS T JOIN TBL_TERMS_HISTORY H ON H.REF_TERMS_NO = T.NO WHERE T.CLASSIFY_CODE = 'GENERAL' AND T.TITLE LIKE '%OSMAS 소개글%' AND H.LAST_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(LAST_DATE) FROM TBL_TERMS_HISTORY WHERE REF_TERMS_NO = T.NO )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TERMS (NO, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, CLASSIFY_CODE, TITLE) SELECT SEQ_TBL_TERMS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'GENERAL', #{title} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TBL_TERMS_HISTORY (NO, CONTENT, LAST_DATE, REF_TERMS_NO) SELECT SEQ_TBL_TERMS_HISTORY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NO FROM TBL_TERMS WHERE CLASSIFY_CODE = 'GENERAL' ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TBL_TERMS_HISTORY (NO, CONTENT, LAST_DATE, REF_TERMS_NO) SELECT SEQ_TBL_TERMS_HISTORY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{content}, SYSDATE, (SELECT NO FROM TBL_TERMS WHERE CLASSIFY_CODE = 'GENERAL' AND TITLE = '${title}' ) FROM DUAL
